member.name: T:GDWebUtilities.WebUtilities
member.summary: Class for storing utility methods for working with web forms.

member.name: M:GDWebUtilities.WebUtilities.GetAllControls(System.Web.UI.Control,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Type})
member.summary: Gets all child controls contained within the provided container.
member.param: Parent container to get all children controls of.
List of control types to not include; Children of an ignored control will also not be returned.
member.returns: Enumerable list of all child controls found on the container.
